title: Delete a data policy
description: Deletes a data policy from the BigQuery Data Policy API, which is identified by its project ID, location, and data policy ID.

objective.narrative: A data governance administrator needs to retire a data policy, such as a column-level masking rule, because the underlying data sensitivity has changed or the policy is being superseded by a new one. This sample provides the code to programmatically delete the policy.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatapolicy_v2_datapolicyservice_datapolicy_delete
regionTags.title: Delete a data policy
regionTags.description: Deletes a data policy from the BigQuery Data Policy API, which is identified by its project ID, location, and data policy ID.
